q: Visitors will be directed to a replica of the painted burial chamber, which will be installed close to Carter's former home in Luxor. Replicas of two other closed tombs will be opened nearby. There's no alternative. Closing the tombs is the only way to preserve them, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's antiquities chief.`` If I don't build this` Valley of the Replicas', the originals will be destroyed in less than 100 years. That would be a disaster for history

. The CML predicts total advances for 2011 will be? 135bn, but warned that an early rise in interest rates due to inflationary pressures could slow consumer demand. CML economist Peter Charles said: Money market rates have recently moved higher in anticipation of a rise in base rate and some lenders have recently reflected these increases in their product pricing.`` Against this backdrop, consumer demand may be weaker than we would otherwise have expected.`` Higher interest rates will also hit the budgets of existing borrowers, although the expected modest rises in base rate will result in a relatively small proportionate rise in monthly payments for most mortgage holders. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.------
